name: Capacity Study
description: Capacity message nodes for clinical observations

data.label: Observation Start
data.message: *examines monitoring equipment* Initiating capacity observation protocol. I will record my clinical observations at your current level.

ranges.message: Subject at baseline capacity. No observable distension. Establishing control readings.
Minimal expansion detected. Subject reports early awareness of internal pressure. Beginning data collection.
Measurable distension observed. Abdominal circumference increasing. Subject's breathing patterns adjusting.
Significant expansion. Subject displaying classic discomfort indicators. *notes* Fascinating response patterns.
Approaching 50% capacity. Subject's autonomic responses are... elevated. Perspiration detected. Continue monitoring.
Past midpoint. Considerable distension. Subject's vocalization frequency increasing. *adjusts instruments* Optimal data collection range.
Substantial capacity achieved. Skin tension visible. Subject showing signs of strain. *records* Approaching interesting thresholds.
High capacity zone. Subject's physical responses intensifying. *clinical observation* Body adapting to extreme internal pressure.
Critical observation zone. Maximum safe parameters being approached. Subject's distress levels... notable. *checks monitors*
Peak capacity. Subject at maximum documented threshold. *leans forward with interest* This is unprecedented data. Every reading is valuable.

data.label: Analysis Complete
data.message: *reviews tablet* Current capacity: [Capacity]%. Observations recorded. Your body continues to provide valuable data for our research. *slight smile* Science thanks you.
